title: Create - Smooth Operator Role
body:
Role: Smooth Operator

Purpose: Ensure Gamer DAO operates as smooth as possible. 

Domains: 

- Notion
    -  Join Gamer DAO Page (https://www.notion.so/Join-Gamer-DAO-9bc7241a751a4668a1bbc3300378f501)
    - Seasons Page (https://www.notion.so/Seasons-eb86b59536a045989791873b9a5f6328)
    - Current Projects and Bounties Page (https://www.notion.so/5556be234f0640f3aed3869d1fa4c4c1)
    -  Squads & Roles Page (https://www.notion.so/Squads-Roles-9973b083e31d4c3a8bb6508a31c3cdf7)
    - Future Projects, Plans & Dreams Page (https://www.notion.so/Future-Projects-Plans-Dreams-ecc5ec03e59d43d3bc09d036c3dc2c82)
    - Onboarding FAQ Page (https://www.notion.so/Onboarding-FAQ-2dc2276813d04100b6c2502f952e4e82)
- Onboarding Process
    - Discord onboarding Channels 1 through 5.
    - New Member Notion Form
    - New Member Form Page and Table (https://www.notion.so/14efa994cd8e432495ac45bec6e07acf) page & table

Accountabilities:
- Create operational and administrative SOPs for Gamer DAO.
- Working with the team to get the season dashboard complete and ready for the new season. Furthermore, keeping it updated throughout the season.
- Optimizing the onboarding process for new members to get involved.
- Maintaining the Gamer DAO calendar and corresponding calendar/scheduling tech
- Keeping Notion and Discord synchronized.

Checklist Items:

- Weekly check for new projects to be added to Season Dashboard in Discord.

Metrics:

- Total Discord Verified Gamers (Community Members)
- Total Registered Members
- Total Contributors
- Contributors:Community Members Ratio
author: 0x380C7200892581b7392CA00DA759A4072B67460D
